PUSH.description: push a literal number into the stack

POP.description: remove the top value of the stack

STORE.description: pop value from stack → write to vars[index]

ADD.description: pop 2 values and push addition result of those values

SUB.description: pop 2 values and push subtraction result of those values

MUL.description: pop 2 values and push multiplication result of those values

DIV.description: pop 2 values and push division result of those values

JUMP_IF_TRUE.description: pop value if value == 1, jump else continue

JUMP_IF_FALSE.description: pop value if value == 0, jump else continue

READ.description: read a value from standard IO (terminal)

PRINT.description: just print the top value from the stack duh
